Package model.calendar

Class Day

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.calendar.Day
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Day
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class is a representation of a single day. It holds the array of lessons that happen on a particular day. It also contains the date of the day. It implements Serializable interface for persistence purposes.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Day()
      Creates a new array list and initializes the date to null.

    • Method Detail

      • getLessons

        public java.util.ArrayList<Lesson> getLessons()
        Returns:
        the array list of lessons

      • setLessons

        public void setLessons​(java.util.ArrayList<Lesson> lessons)
        Assigns lesson array list to the local array list of lessons. After that, it iterates through all the lessons and sets their date to the date field of the class.
        Parameters:
        lessons - the array list of lessons

      • isValidDataForTime

        public boolean isValidDataForTime​(Lesson lesson)
        Inspects the lesson's time interval validity.
        Parameters:
        lesson - the lesson to be inspected for validity
        Returns:
        true if the lesson's start and end time doesn't overlap with any other lesson's start and end time

      • addLesson

        public void addLesson​(Lesson lesson)
        Sets the date of the given lesson to the date field of the day. After adding the given lesson, it sorts the entire array list of lessons based on the starting time.
        Parameters:
        lesson - the lesson to be added the array list of lessons

      • removeLesson

        public void removeLesson​(Lesson lesson)
        First tries to unbook the given lessons. Then is proceeds to remove a lesson from the array list.
        Parameters:
        lesson - the lesson to be removed from the array list

      • getIndexForDay

        public int getIndexForDay()
        Returns:
        the index of a day based on the value of a day of the week minus one

      • setDate

        public void setDate​(java.time.LocalDate date)
        Parameters:
        date - the date to of the day to be set

      • copyLessons

        public java.util.ArrayList<Lesson> copyLessons​(java.time.LocalDate date)
        Parameters:
        date - the date of the day
        Returns:
        new array list containing the copy of all the lessons

      • getDate

        public java.time.LocalDate getDate()
        Returns:
        the date of the day
